phases.title: Foundation Building
phases.goal: Establish core skills and knowledge required for your target role
phases.focus: Build a solid foundation in essential technologies and concepts

items.title: Master JavaScript Fundamentals
items.description: Deepen your JavaScript knowledge with ES6+, async programming, closures, and modern patterns. Master debugging techniques and performance optimization.

resources.title: Eloquent JavaScript
resources.description: Comprehensive introduction to JavaScript with practical exercises

items.title: HTML/CSS Mastery
items.description: Advance your frontend skills with modern CSS techniques, responsive design, accessibility, and performance optimization.

phases.title: Skill Development
phases.goal: Deepen expertise in key areas and build practical projects
phases.focus: Apply your foundational knowledge to real-world projects and advanced concepts

items.title: React Development
items.description: Master React hooks, context, performance optimization, advanced patterns, and state management solutions. Learn testing strategies and best practices.

resources.title: React Official Documentation
resources.description: Official React documentation with interactive examples and best practices

items.title: Build: Advanced E-commerce Platform
items.description: Build a full-featured e-commerce platform with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard. Implement advanced features like product recommendations, real-time inventory updates, and analytics.

projects.title: Advanced E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Build a full-featured e-commerce platform with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard. Implement advanced features like product recommendations, real-time inventory updates, and analytics.

phases.title: Advanced Mastery
phases.goal: Develop leadership capabilities and specialized knowledge
phases.focus: Master advanced concepts and develop leadership skills

items.title: System Design Mastery
items.description: Design large-scale distributed systems, understand trade-offs, and architectural patterns. Learn to make critical technical decisions for complex systems.

resources.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
resources.description: Essential book for understanding distributed systems and data architecture

items.title: Technical Leadership Training
items.description: Develop skills in technical decision making, team leadership, and cross-functional collaboration. Learn to drive technical initiatives and mentor team members.

resources.title: Technical Leadership Masterclass
resources.description: Developing technical leadership skills and team management strategies

phases.title: Real-World Application
phases.goal: Gain practical experience and establish industry presence
phases.focus: Apply your skills in real-world scenarios and build your professional presence

items.title: Build a Portfolio of Real Projects
items.description: Create 2-3 substantial projects that demonstrate your skills in your target domain. Focus on solving real problems and showcasing your technical abilities.

items.title: Technical Blog & Community Engagement
items.description: Start writing technical blogs, contribute to open source projects, and engage with the developer community. Establish thought leadership in your domain.
